name: Digital Attack
description:
CONTROLS ---

press the move keys to move

move your mouse to move the mouse cursor

lmb to shoot and rmb to do bouncey shot (bouncey shot does less damage)

NON CONTROLS ---

The epik moosik is made by Sewon and Patrikus Droilius. The bad song was made by me. Also I couldn't think of name so I just stole the name a Sewon's song.
